mods.abstract: Photograph on Page 16 shows a Louisiana agricultural exhibit titled "South Louisiana Fair Association" featuring an arrangement of produce and products. Exhibited at the Great South Louisiana State Fair in Donaldsonville. Fair dates listed as October 8-12, 1914.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
